purpose: Facilitate the creation and management of autonomous multi-agent systems through event-driven architecture.
principle: Utilizes an event-based framework to coordinate interactions and behaviors among multiple autonomous agents.
reusability: Designed as a framework that can be extended and customized for specific multi-agent system applications. Offers modular components for agent behavior and communication.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may include incomplete features and potential bugs. Limited documentation on complex use cases.
name: genworlds
description: A framework for event based autonomous multi-agent systems.
